channel.title: Client help
channel.description:
Umm, sorry if this is wrong section.
What I need help with is; When my client is used, in-game players text above there heads is like;
[code]cyan:slide:[/code]
I want to change it though, Where do I go to change it?
thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: [/size][hr]Dam wrong section :| Can this be moved to Cleint Help, sorry

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Which client are you using, and this is either in gui.java, client.java, or userloader.java. Open all three, press ctrl + f, and search for “setcolour” or “setchat” or “seteffect”.

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
